description:
The man who carved the initials UD into Mamiya`s shoulder was Yuda, the traitorous bearer of the Star of Enchantment and one of the 108 styles of the South Star Sacred Fist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nanto Rokuseiken Yuda! Ore wa Dareyorimo Utsukushii!!
Yuda of the South Star Six Sacred Fist! I`m the Most Beautiful!!
南斗六聖拳ユダ! 俺は誰よりも美しい!!
